error.mongoDBnoConnection: Error, we'll fix it as soon as possible, https://uptime.anitrack.co/

maintenance.message: We are very sorry for this inconvenience, currently all of the services are locked and unavailable due to Maintenance... Meanwhile we will keep you informed at https://uptime.anitrack.co/ please be patient
maintenance.response: Error, 403 The service is on maintenance

en.tooFast: Please wait and select one of the search result before sending the command.

error.notAdministrator: ‚ùå Sorry, But this command requires **MANAGE SERVER** or **ADMINISTRATOR** role privileges in order to use it
error.noPremium: ‚ùå Sorry, But this server needs to have a Patreon tier 2 subscription in order to use this command!
error.notOwner: ‚ùå Sorry, But you are not allowed to use this command. Only server owner are allowed to use this command.

list.noNotifyRoom:
‚ö† Oops, Looks like this server is not yet setup. Please use command `/anime admin setchannel [SelectedChannel]` to continue using the bot!

||Or this might have happened because the bot itself lost its permission to send messages or the NotifyChannel has been deleted. Don't worry the anime & notify list still stays the same and has not been deleted||
list.noAnime: ‚ö† Oops, Looks like this server doesn't have any Anime added to the tracking list. Please add them by using `/anime add [AnimeID or Romaji/English Name] [Anime Nickname]`... Note! If you are confused or lost about the commands you can visit the NotifyChannel and read the Bot's help message for more information you can type slash to see all documented commands.
list.noSubscribe: ‚ö† Oops, Looks like you haven't subscribe to any of the Anime in the tracking list yet, you can subscribe to them by using `/anime subscribe [Anime Nickname]` or unsubscribe with `/anime unsubscribe [AnimeNickname]`

error.noNotify: No notify channel, Please create one /anime admin setchannel
error.noPermission: No role permission. Please contact this server administrator

error.IDtooLong: This ID does not fit the Anilist criteria, please try again.
error.AlreadyAiredID: This Anime has already been aired, Please search for Airing or Not Yet Aired Anime.
error.IDnoExist: This ID does not exist, please try another.
error.notFound: Can not find anime with this exact name! Or the anime has already aired... Please try another.

error.missingPermissionSendMessage: Something has gone wrong while trying to add the channel... Maybe missing permissions on target channel to send or view channel `View Channels` `Send Messages`? Please check the Bot's permission and try again later
error.missingPermissionCreateWebhook: Something has gone wrong while trying to add the channel... Maybe missing permissions on target channel to create a webhook `Manage Webhooks`? Please check the Bot's permission and try again later
error.tooMuchWebhook: Something has gone wrong while trying to add the channel... Maybe too much Webhooks has been created for target Channel or Server? Please try to delete some of them then try again later
error.alreadySet: Sorry, but Looks like there's already a NotifyChannel setup... If you wish to remove please use `/anime admin removechannel`, don't worry as this won't reset your anime or notify list
error.fishy:
<:fishy:964129009057280020>  **Oops, looks like something very fishy is going on .-.**

Maybe you're trying to get a larger Anime List by setting up a multiple servers or you might forgot to disable/remove notifyChannel before deleting the previous Discord Server?

If so, please mass disable AniTrack Bot on every servers you owned with `/debug "Server Owner | Disable NotifyChannel on every servers I owned"` Don't worry! Nothing will be deleted. You just have to manually setup the notifyChannel on each server your owned again.

response.replySetA: Successfully set channel & Created a webhook for
response.replySetB: You may start using the Bot now!
response.removedChannel:
:pushpin: Successfully removed the NotifyChannel!

Please kindly delete the unused webhook manually if you'd like to.
As the Bot itself cannot delete the webhook by itself but the bot will ignore and no longer send updates to that webhook anymore

existedNickname.back: is already on the list, please try another Anime Nickname

isDelayed.back: has been delayed and will have a new airing schedule soon or later...
